resources.string: To make an interval alarm, please, choose the interval you would like to use
You are about to delete this alarm. Click "OK" to continue
You are about to save the edited alarm
Are you sure you want to save the edits?
Are you sure you want to cancel it?
You can`t schedule it to the past
Please, choose a valid time.\nTip: you can schedule it to at least 1 minute in future
For the application to work properly, please, provide a Notification permission.\nWe need it to notify you whenever the alarm has rung.
